enumDescriptions.Manual: Completed tasks are not automatically overwritten.

TaskService.description: The TaskService schema describes a Task Service that enables management of long-duration operations, includes the properties for the Task Service itself, and has links to the actual Resource Collection of Tasks.
TaskService.longDescription: This Resource contains a Task Service for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CompletedTaskOverWritePolicy.description: The overwrite policy for completed tasks.  This property indicates whether the Task Service overwrites completed task information.
CompletedTaskOverWritePolicy.longDescription: This property shall indicate how the Task Service shall handle completed tasks if the service must track more tasks.  This property indicates whether the Task Service overwrites completed task information.

DateTime.description: The current date and time, with UTC offset, setting that the Task Service uses.
DateTime.longDescription: This property shall represent the current DateTime value for the Task Service, with UTC offset, in Redfish Timestamp format.

LifeCycleEventOnTaskStateChange.description: An indication of whether a task state change sends an event.
LifeCycleEventOnTaskStateChange.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether a task state change sends an event.  The Eventing section of the Redfish Specification defines life-cycle events.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

ServiceEnabled.description: An indication of whether this service is enabled.
ServiceEnabled.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether this service is enabled.

Status.description: The status and health of the Resource and its subordinate or dependent Resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the Resource.

Tasks.description: The links to the Tasks collection.
Tasks.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a Resource of type TaskCollection.
